info.instr: Once you get to the second floor, you should find yourself in a hallway. With your back to the stairs, turn to your right and walk down the hallway in that direction.

info.desc: Past this set of black doors, you can see a set of doors with a sign above them. Note the Gopher Way sign next to the black doors.
info.instr: You will see a Gopher Way sign with the words 'Mechanical Engineering' on it.
Past that sign, you will see a set of doors with a sign above them that reads 'You are entering: Mechanical Engineering | Level 2'. Walk through those doors.

info.desc: This set of doors leads to the second level of Mechanical Engineering.
info.instr: You are now on the second level of Mechanical Engineeering!
